channel.title: Outside.In on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Outside.In on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: outside.in "top local blog" roundup: what exactly am i writing about here?
item.description: outside.in is a blog aggregator; it scoops up posts from around the net, codes them by geography, and then presents you the reader with a feed that's local to whatever you want it to be local about.  Here is the outside.in Ann Arbor page .  I get their newsletter sent to me which ends up being a good day's local news clippings. Here's their roundup of top Ann Arbor blogs and bloggers; Vacuum is listed as a top local blog.
